text: Kenneth 'Ken' Nelson Nuttall (3 February 1942-15 December 1969), was a male cyclist who competed for England. ==Cycling career== He represented England in the road race at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. He rode for the Manchester Wheelers and was runner-up in the British National Road Race Championships. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:1969 deaths Category:English male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Ken Nuttall
